I dont usually write rewviews on games, but csgo is by far my favorite game in my library. its cool to play casual and stuff like that but once you begin playing competitive you learn to communicte with your teammates, and ive gotten a bunch of friends from this game. 10/10 would recommend

Used to love this game but i feel like skins has to big of an impact on this game. Aswell as the competitive player base draining out so even if you're in a comp game people don't care if they win or loose.

Surfing is still insanely fun, so if you are gonna buy this game i would recommend only playing in the community tab.

7/10 Surfing saves this game from 3-4/10
